name: Best Actor in a Leading Role
normalized_name: Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role

candidates.notes: Pacino became the third actor (after Peter O'Toole) to be twice nominated for an Oscar for portraying the same character; he had previously portrayed Michael Corleone in The Godfather (1972).

candidates.notes: Robert De Niro was not present at the awards ceremony. Francis Ford Coppola accepted the award on his behalf.
